alert.note: Alert for McNairy (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 02 at 3:47PM CDT until May 02 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Prentiss County in northeastern Mississippi... Alcorn County in northeastern Mississippi... Southeastern McNairy County in west Tennessee... * Until 430 PM CDT. * At 347 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hinkle, or 8 miles northwest of Booneville, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Corinth, Booneville, Jumpertown, Hinkle, Theo, Farmington, Eastview, Michie, Guys, Ramer, Rienzi, Kossuth, Collinstown, Wenasoga, Biggersville, Tulu, Jobes, Gaston, Acton and Chewalla. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
